_description: This configuration connects the AI Agents autonomous development system with OpenMemory's long-term memory capabilities

openmemory._comment_api_key: Set this if your OpenMemory instance requires authentication
openmemory._comment_fallback: If true, falls back to local file system if OpenMemory is unavailable

state.description: Project state and configuration stored as semantic knowledge

actions.description: Agent actions and development history stored as episodic memories

patterns.description: Coding patterns and best practices stored as procedural knowledge

decisions.description: Architectural decisions and rationale stored as reflective insights

agent_config._comment_context_window: Number of recent actions to retrieve on resume

state_management._comment_sync: Keep local project-state.json in sync with OpenMemory

integration_features._comment_semantic: Use OpenMemory's semantic search to find relevant past decisions and patterns
integration_features._comment_pattern: Automatically identify and store recurring code patterns
integration_features._comment_context: Load full context (history, patterns, decisions) when resuming
integration_features._comment_cross_session: Maintain memory across multiple development sessions
integration_features._comment_decay: Let less important memories naturally decay over time
